There is a film about Takeda Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin named "Kagetora", which as all of you know was the name of kenshin before being adopted by the uesugi clan; it has quite good photography and fighting scenes, and a representation of the 4th battle of Kawanakajima, featuring a personal duel between Shingen and Kenshin; is that it?, it was produced by MGM.
Hope this helps.
Edwin.
